header.heading: Android Game Development Bootcamp
header.subHeading: Learn to Build Exciting Android Games

overview.content:
Coding Blocks is pleased to bring you this Android Game Development Bootcamp at our Coding Blocks Greater Noida center. It is an opportunity for everyone who is interested in learning how to build android games using Java and Libgdx which is a popular game development framework. In bootcamp, instructor will cover games such as Flappy Bird, Supper Jumber, Cut the rope and many more.

Apart from Game Development, this bootcamp will introduce you to adding Google Game Services for global leaderboard and achivements and Google AdSense for earning with your game application.
There will be total 3 sessions in the bootcamp from September 30, 2017 - October 2, 2017.

CONTENTS
Introduction to Screens, Game Loop, Libgdx
Game world and view ports
Flappy Bird Game
Super Jumper
Cutting the Rope
Google AdSense
Google Game Services

courseHighlights.title: Libgdx 2D
courseHighlights.content: Libgdx is a Java game development framework capable of making Cross-Platform games with minimal fuss. The framework provides an environment for rapid prototyping and fast iterations. you can run and debug your game on the desktop, natively.

courseHighlights.title: Sensors
courseHighlights.content: In the bootcamp, you will learn topics like implementing event listeners, Gesture Detection, Accelerometer, Compass, Gyroscope, Vibration, Sound effects and other input output handling to build super cool games

courseHighlights.title: Google AdSense
courseHighlights.content: Earning from the app the top most reason for creating any app. Google AdSense is a free, simple way for app publishers of all sizes to earn money by displaying targeted Google ads in their apps

courseHighlights.title: Physics Engine
courseHighlights.content: Most Arcade Games require some kind of physics to be implemented in the game. In this bootcamp we will explore the Libgdx's Physics engine named Box2D to add gravity, velocity and simulate collisions on our objects.

faqs.ans: Any one who have some knowledge of Java syntax and OOP and want to learn developing games with libgdx - a popular java framework for making 2-D Games. Students in 1st and 2nd year can also join this bootcamp.

faqs.ques: What are the pre-requisites for this bootcamp?
faqs.ans: You just need to have prior programming practice in Java basic understanding of oop. That's it. No prior knowledge of android is required
